title: Client   Lunar shop reset ?

replies.body: The skins that are being replaced in your Lunar Revel Shop are scheduled to go on sale either in January or February. We don't want you to get a Lunar Revel sale only to see it in a regular sale over the next few days, so we have replaced those sales in the Lunar Revel Shop with different offers.

This is not fully pertaining to the original post but it is about the Lunar Revel and Shop its concerning the Mystery chest though, do you know when it will be up? there was no date listed just the fact that it will be here till the 8th and i thought it would be live along with everything else but it is no where to be found can you shed some light on this?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} Please and Thank you!

Hi hi! 

The Lunar Revel Mystery Gifting event has been unlocked since January 26th, and as you've said, goes until February 8th. 

The TL;DR is you can double your chances of unlocking Legendary and Lunar Revel skins through Mystery Gifts. (This means both Mystery Skins Gifts as well as the Mystery Skin Chests!) No special button, just use the normal Gifting Center. ^-^

The following Lunar Revel Skins are part of the double chance (Includes 2016 Lunar Revel skins as well!):

Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere, Warring Kingdoms Jarvan IV, Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao, Warring Kingdoms Nidalee, Warring Kingdoms Katarina, DragonBlade Riven, Dragon Fist Lee Skin, Dragonblade Talon, Dragonwing Corki, Jade Dragon Wukong, Panda Annie, Jade Fang Cassiopeia, Firecracker Jinx, Guqin Sona, Lunar Goddess Diana, Lunar Wraith Caitlyn, Lunar Wraith Morgana, Radiant Wukong.

Hope this helps!

We don't want you to get a Lunar Revel sale only to see it in a regular sale over the next few days, so we have replaced those sales in the Lunar Revel Shop with different offers.

But in the OP's blurb, they said that they had the skin at a 70% discount, which is a better offer than the usual 50% discount that regular skin sales go for. That's a little unfair if a better discount is removed from their offer listing. I could understand if it was for the 20% and 30% Lunar Revel offers - I'd be upset if I bought it for sale and then saw it go on sale for a cheaper price; But for it to be on the 60% and 70% off sale, I would be upset if you removed it and then offered it to me at a higher price. It doesn't quite make much sense in that manner.
